properties.address: Alcombe Methodist Church, Minehead, Somerset TA24 6AN
properties.description: Relaxed a warm welcome to everyone who join us for refreshments, a light lunch, laughter and a quiz
properties.title: Alcombe Church

properties.address: Alcombe Methodist Church, Minehead, Somerset TA24 6AN
properties.description: We offer a space for people to come and share in conversation and friendship, with activities and presentations from local groups or organisations, followed by a cooked two-course lunch and taxi for those that may need it. Pre-booking needed for catering and lifts but all abilities and dietary requirements welcome. Contact Penny Williams via westsomersetmethodists.org.uk for details.
properties.title: Alcombe Friendship Centre

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and a study area. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. On Wednesday afternoons we run Author talks from October to April once a month. Booking required, email minlib@somerset.gov.uk for more information. We also have scales to weigh your baby during opening hours (instructions available). Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Minehead Library

properties.address: Minehead Methodist Church, Minehead, Somerset TA24 5AY
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 14th February 2025** We offer a warm, friendly space with drinks on hand and a light lunch. Every Friday 10.30-2pm Crafts, chat and a quiz.
properties.title: Minehead Methodist Church

properties.description: The Sanctuary is the living room of Watchet Baptist Church - our building in the town centre.
properties.title: The Sanctuary

properties.address: United Reformed Church, MINEHEAD, Somerset TA24 5DJ
properties.description: Now on Tuesdays 10 till 12 All Welcome for Tea, Coffee, Chat and Friendship Recycle and Reuse Table. A lovley warm Space
properties.title: Tuesdays Warm Space Refreshments and Chat

properties.address: Rhoose Community Library, Fontygary Road, Rhoose, CF62 3DS
properties.description: We will provide a place where members of the community can feel warm, welcome and relaxed but more importantly meet, talk and socialise with other members of the community. We will provide craft activities, board games, cards and leaflets for the various services available in the Vale. The Vale Community Resource Service can advise on a range of issues such as falls prevention and staying well. Our digital champion will be on hand to support our customers with access to the internet.
properties.title: Rhoose Library

properties.address: All Saints Church Hall, Park Road, Barry – Hall is located behind All Saints Church
properties.description: We support military veterans and their families. There is a weekly breakfast group providing a hot breakfast and hot & cold drinks, toast, biscuits.
properties.title: Barry Veterans Group
